sentence.Network_en: Our oceangoing ship is ploughing across the Pacific Ocean.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的远洋轮正在横渡太平洋.

sentence.Network_en: They have thrown out a pier to accommodate oceangoing freighters.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们建成一个凸式码头供停靠远洋货轮使用.

sentence.Network_en: By 1525 , the authorities ordered that all oceangoing vessels be destroyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 1525年,中国下令毁掉所有远洋船只.

entry.def: Ocean-going ships are designed for travelling on the sea rather than on rivers, canals, or lakes.

example.ex: At the height of his shipping career he owned about 60 ocean-going vessels.
example.tran: 他在航运事业的巅峰时期拥有将近60艘远洋轮船。

auth_sentence.content: Within a year, he had acquired several oceangoing vessels.
auth_sentence.res_content: Within a year, he had acquired several oceangoing vessels.

auth_sentence.content: The maps gave the impression that an armada of oceangoing skimmers could suck up the oil in one place.

auth_sentence.content: Liquid Robotics' rivals in the nascent market for emissions-free oceangoing drones include Teledyne Webb Research and iRobot.
